skillTree.localised_description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The touch of an aged Phoenix is enough to freeze a warrior to death.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: The Archmage crackles and flows with energies that would unmake any mortal practitioner.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

skillTree.localised_description: Mere talent alone is not enough, one must be truly gifted to be chosen to study at the Tower of Hoeth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: With precise applications of unmaking, any threat may be rendered null and void in turn.
The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Those who seek greater understanding of the world may turn to Hoeth for knowledge and guidance.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind Blast Upgraded"

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Banishment Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: One of the mightiest artifacts among the world of the living, the Crown of the Goddess of the Moon inspires those around it to greatness.
The elven goddess protects it's followers, striking back those who seek their destruction.

ui_effects.localised_text: Redirects projectiles back towards the firing unit

skillTree.localised_description: Talarian maintains a constant influx of magical energies between him and the eye of the vortex, and can unleash it at his will.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Talarian believes that the written word is the Elves's most powerful weapon against the forces of chaos, and in the Tower of Hoeth he spends weeks diving into it's infinite knowledge.
Even though now he has trascended the existence of a normal loremaster, in his heart there is still room for memories, love and companionship, from the days of his studies and training.

effects.description: Upkeep: -25% for Swordmasters of Hoeth units
Leadership: +15 for Swordmasters of Hoeth units

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having come back from the inside of the Vortex, Talarian was changed, now an extremely wise yet mysterious person, a walking leyend amongst the Asur.
